channel.title: Need help adding vote commands and link
channel.description: hey guys I got a few vote links for my server, but im not good with java and all this os need help. I need help with to add the commands in for say ::vote1 ::vote 2::vote3 ::vote4 and then ::claim to work for all of them, I want the reward to be 5m cash and after voting on all 4 links then do ::claimvp and you will then get 1 vote point after voting on all 4 links. And also when I do ::jail the player can just tele home... Any help? I have skype and TeamViewer. Please help me :)

item.title: Need help adding vote commands and link
item.dc:creator: @Archaic317 Archaic317
item.description:
@Archaic317 wrote:

Thankyou for replying But I have managed to fix it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding vote commands and link

item.title: Need help adding vote commands and link
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re going to want to use a vote system tutorial if your not fluent in PHP, Java, and MySQL.

That’s because the voting uses callbacks, which most people use PHP to read, and then save it to a MySQL table for their server to read (Using java of course).

Adding the commands (At least the ::vote ones) are easy depending on what source you have.
Adding ::claim will depend on whether or not you follow a tutorial. If you follow one, it’s easy (They give it to you - usually) if not, you’d have to write the code yourself… which would be getting data from the database and then finding the specified username, if it exists, and so on.

It is also required that you have REMOTE MySQL on your website, or where ever your MySQL database is. That’s because your server is typically not on the same machine as the MySQL database, so you must access it remotely.

You didn’t tell us any information about your server… so it’s kind of hard to say what your command needs to look like, but here is a generic one:

if(playerCommand.equalsIngoreCase("vote")) { sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000);
if www.google.com does not work, try http://google.com

And if neither work, check into your client and make sure it is set up to use frame 12000 for opening websites.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding vote commands and link
